body.name: BIBS Baby Glass Bottle. Anti-Colic. Round Natural Rubber Latex Nipple. Supports Natural Breastfeeding, Complete Set - 225 ml, Woodchuck
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 12 hrs 6 mins
features: Legacy of Quality: With over 40 years of experience, BIBS is a trusted brand, renowned for providing high-quality, durable pacifiers. Each product reflects a commitment to safety and comfort, embodying a legacy of Danish design and craftsmanship.

Variety of Choices: BIBS offers a diverse range of pacifiers to suit every stage of a baby's growth. From the classic Colour range to the innovative Couture, Boheme, and De Lux collections, there's a style, size, and design to meet every infant's needs.

Safe and Sustainable Materials: Committed to your baby's health and the environment, BIBS pacifiers are made from safe, non-toxic materials. Our products are BPA, PVC, and phthalate-free, ensuring a sustainable choice for eco-conscious families.

Designed for Comfort: BIBS pacifiers are designed to mimic the natural shape of a mother’s breast, promoting a natural sucking reflex. With options in natural rubber latex and silicone, every pacifier ensures a soothing experience for your baby.

Innovative Features: Understanding diverse needs, BIBS pacifiers come in various nipple shapes - round, symmetrical, and anatomical, catering to different preferences and oral development stages. Our innovative designs and features set us apart as a leader in the baby care industry.
body.description: Our baby bottle is carefully designed for babies and parents. The bottle is designed with the child’s needs in mind and is made of borosilicate glass, which is temperature- and thermal shock-resistant, durable, and much more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Its a big NO for me
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this bottle is wrong!! There is huge design flaw. Bottle opening is too small you have to use funnel provided otherwise you will spill formula everywhere. Of course its extra part to wash and sanitize. Its also very difficult go clean bottle due to small opening. Cap is the most difficult to open out of 5 baby bottles I tried. Sometimes even my husband cant open it and has to use tool to open. If you close the bottle too tight, formula will squirt out of nipple. You have to tighten it very carefully. If its too loose, it will leak. Also bottle is long and narrow which makes it easy to tip over and break. The bottle is thinner than any other glass bottle. It also wont fit it steam sterilizer.Why am I using this despite of my complaints above? My breastfed baby wont take any other bottle but this! Try all other brans first before you give this bottle to your baby. There are way better products out there. Avoid this if you have alternatives!!

Era tempo ormai che combattevamo con i vari biberon e le annesse tettarelle sempre siliconiche. Abbiamo provato con le tettarelle 0-1-2-3 ma il piccolo rifiutava continuamente il biberon. Inizialmente pensavamo ci fosse qualcosa che non andava nel latte. Abbiamo provato questo biberon con tettarella in lattice e dopo 10 secondi di esitazione da parte del piccolo mai avuto più problemi. Non c'è paragone con le altre marche. Se si potevano dare 6 stelle le avrei date
Es muy incómodo de usar para preparar la leche, casi imposible introducir la fórmula porque es muy estrecha la boquilla, y la tetera tiene el hueco muy muy pequeño, no sale la leche bien.
Ottimo i prodotti bibs. Purtroppo il prodotto manca di un pezzo molto utile. Contattato il rivenditore non ho ottenuto risposta.
